person.persName: Johnson Ledbetter (Greene Co. AK, farmer and private 1st Ky Light Artillery )

body.p: Greene County, Arkansas, farmer and soldier. North Carolina native. Son of Nancy Ledbetter. Student and laborer in Chatham County, North Carolina, in 1850. Farmer in Greene County, Arkansas, in 1860. Served in the 1st Kentucky Light Artillery (U.S.A.) as private and wagoner from September 10, 1863, to July 26, 1865.
